en.title: Scarf Dance (Creative Movement)
en.body:
For this activity you will need one scarf or one piece of a soft and flowy fabric.

For babies:

Move your scarf to the music. Interact with your baby and let him touch,feel and watch the scarf moving.

For toddlers and kids:

Move around freely with your scarf and dance to the music.

There are no rules!

Encourage your kids to make up their own movements.
